project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project consists of the rehabilitation of 6,830 feet of existing sea defense structures and the construction of 1,570 feet of new structures, construction of a diversion road, construction of eight drainage outfalls, construction of a slipway, procurement of two tugs and nine pontoons, purchase of steel sheet piles and equipment, consultant services for the detailed engineering and supervision of construction.
